model.roster

Class GradedItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.roster.GradedItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GradedItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A grade-able assignment, and a category in the gradebook
    Author:
    Gavin Scott
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GradedItem

        public GradedItem(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String descr,
                  double maxScore,
                  boolean extraCredit)
        Creates a graded item with the given information. The parent will be set to null, and the score will be set to zero.
        Parameters:
        name - the assignment's name
        descr - the assignment's description

      • GradedItem

                  java.lang.String descr,

        Parameters:

        descr - The assignment's description
        score - The assignment's score

        public GradedItem(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String descr,
                  double maxScore,
                  GradedItem parent,
                  boolean extraCredit)
        Creates a graded item with the given information. The score will be set to zero
        Parameters:
        name - The assignment's name
        descr - The assignment's description
        parent - The assignment's parent assignment or category

      • setParent

        public void setParent(GradedItem newParent)
        Sets another assignment as the parent of this GradedItem, and marks this assignment as a child of the new parent. It also removes itself from its old parent's list of children.
        Parameters:
        newParent - The new parent assignment

      • calcScore

        public double calcScore()
        Calculates a score based on the assignment's children.
        Returns:
        double the sum of this assignment's score and all of its children's scores
